name: Schnappi: Das kleine Krokodil: 3 Fun-Games
overview: Schnappi, das kleine Krokodil (Schnappi, the little crocodile) is a German children's cartoon. Schnappi was a character in a popular animated German children's TV show called Die Sendung mit der Maus (The Show With The Mouse). The introductory song reached #1 on the German charts in January 2005. In 2005, Phenomedia released a Schnappi video game for Sony's PlayStation games console. The game was only released in Germany, and might possibly be one of Europe's last PlayStation 1 games. The game is actually 3 games in 1: - Schnappi Schnapp! : A fly eating game - Schnappi Denk! : A memory game - Schnappi Tanz! : A dancing game
